long_description: Easy to find in the dark, Night Glow Zipper Pulls from MSR are a convenient, lightweight upgrade to your tent's metal zipper pulls. Plastic pulls glow for a full 8 hours and recharge in ambient light. Night Glow Zipper Pulls are easy to grip without removing gloves or mittens. Includes 4 zipper pulls.
short_description: Easy to find in the dark, Night Glow Zipper Pulls from MSR are a convenient, lightweight upgrade to your tent's metal zipper pulls.
